duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage operations and operations staff to support the wholesale functions for the DISH Wireless brand family.
Develop and implement sales operations processes and best practices that can be implemented throughout the wholesale operations organization.
Responsible for developing and automating daily/weekly/monthly/ad-hoc reporting for wholesale operations partners and vendor.
Handle key operational support functions and special ad-hoc projects for the wholesale operations department.
Responsible for various senior meeting content and reporting.
Work with DISH headquarters related to reporting and audit requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business, operations, or related field; equivalent combination of education and experience will be considered. MBA is a plus.
